text: tannalute vasamulla terattilum incililum rekhappetuttiyatayi avar kanunna niraksaranaya pravacakanuntallea avar a daivadutane pinparrunnavaran. avareat addeham nanma kalpikkukayum tinma vilakkukayum ceyyunnu. uttama vastukkal avarkk anuvadaniyamakkukayum citta vastukkal nisid'dhamakkukayum ceyyunnu. avare nericcukeantirikkunna bharannal irakkivekkunnu. avare kurukkiyitta vilannukal aliccumarrunnu. atinal addehattil visvasikkukayum addehatte saktippetuttukayum sahayikkukayum addehattin avatirnamaya prakasatte pintutarukayum ceyyunnavararea, avaran vijayam variccavar
